mapper.sql: id, xp_no, name, id_card, password, sex, region, grade, stu_mentor_id, stu_mentor_name, hk_mentor_id, hk_mentor_name, high_school, university, school_year, major, living, email, weixin, qq, phone, high_sch_region, bank_card_no, bank_name, bank_address, is_system, is_mentor, is_funded, is_qualified, is_deleted, gmt_created, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (xp_no, name, id_card, password, sex, region, grade, stu_mentor_id, stu_mentor_name, hk_mentor_id, hk_mentor_name, high_school, university, school_year, major, living, email, weixin, qq, phone, high_sch_region, bank_card_no, bank_name, bank_address, is_system, is_mentor, is_funded, is_qualified, is_deleted, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values (#{xpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuMentorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuMentorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hkMentorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hkMentorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{living,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{highSchRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSystem,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMentor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isFunded,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isQualified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update user
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xp_no = #{record.xpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{record.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
